location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Swinton, Secretary to the Government of Bengal, to Colonel John MacDonald Kinneir, Envoy to the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: George Swinton acknowledges receipt of MacDonald's despatches, dated 10 and 24 May and 1, 10, 12 and 20 August 1826, and encloses a copy of a minute by Lord Amherst, the Governor General of India, dated 17 December 1826, concerning the Russo-Persian War.
